markdownRemark.html:
Typesetting Basics
  • Jost Hochuli, Detail in typography (2005)
  • James Goggin, Some Notes on Typography
Dynamic Text Environments
  • Tim Brown, Flexible Typesetting, 2018
  • Jason Pamental. Evolution of Typography
Cross-Platform Systems
  • Andrew Sodern, How do you print out the entire internet (2019)
  • Edo Smitshuijzen,Sculpting type:an introduction to cnc typography
  • The transformation of silence into language and action, Audre Lorde
  • Angela Riechers, The Virtual Frontier
  • Nicolas Jaar, Network Book
  • Michael Betancourt The History of Motion Graphics
  • Bethany Heck, “The Value of Multi-Typeface Design” (2017) video
Digital Type
  • Indra Kupferschmid, “Typography on the Web,” Kupferschrift, 19 February 2015 [JG]
  • Nick Sherman, The Future of Responsive Typography (2014)
  • Nick Sherman, Variable Fonts for Responsive Design (2015)
  • David Jonathan Ross, We Are Family! I’ve Got All My Variations With Me (2017)
  • Indra Kupferschmid, “The Essentials of Web Typography” (2015)
  • Indra Kupferschmid, “Using Type in the Digital Realm” (2016) video
  • Christoph-Knoth: Computed type: http://christoph-knoth.com/shared/computed_type_-_christoph_knoth.pdf
  • Dexter Sinister:a note on the type
